name: Luxblade
description:
This exploration adventure made in Bitsy will make you get lost in the depths of the forest of Helikin.

Your quest consists of finding The Luxblade, a legendary sword. But finding it won't be straight forward. You will have to uncover the secrets of the woods, and in doing so you may also uncover the forgotten history of the artifact you are looking for.

Take your explorer's pack and enter the forest, The Luxblade is waiting for you!
